# Roadmap

## Near Term (0-2 months)
- Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions (format, validate, copy)
- Improve large-file performance with streaming parsing
- Add offline-ready PWA support
- Expand conversion tools (JSON â†” Parquet/Avro)
- Accessibility polish (WCAG 2.1 AA audit)

## Mid Term (3-6 months)
- Team-friendly features: shareable permalinks and presets
- Schema-aware editing with inline validation hints
- Pluggable formatter presets (tabs/spaces, trailing commas)
- Export/import editor settings
- Monaco editor performance tuning and code-splitting

## Long Term (6-12 months)
- Collaboration features (real-time co-editing)
- AI-assisted fixes (optional, client-side first)
- Plugin system for custom converters
- Desktop builds via Tauri/Electron (optional)

## Quality & Ops
- CI: lint + build + smoke tests on PRs
- Regular dependency updates
- Error boundary coverage and logging (client-side only)
- Performance budgets for bundle size and TTFB

## Community
- Good-first-issue labels curated monthly
- Monthly triage of issues and PRs
- Documentation improvements tracked as first-class tasks
